Sequence Information.Peptide Name: HHC-48 (synthetic AMPs, Trp-rich; Lys-rich; XXA, UCLL1c)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (60%) toInverso-CysHHC10W: 44%; R: 22%, K: 33%.Activity: active against 6 P. aeruginosa PAO1 or WT or resistant strains (MIC 1.4-46 uM), E. cloacae Strain C601 (MIC 23 uM), E. coli ESBL (MIC 3 uM), K. pneumoniae (MIC 46 uM), S. aureus ATCC 25923 or MRSA (MIC 1.4-39 uM), 5 E. faecalis ATCC29212 (MIC 6-93 uM) anti-VRE 2 strains MIC =>186 uM (AMP-resistant?).
Literature Information.Author: Hancock RE, Hilpert K, Cherkasov A, Fjell C.2006
Literature Information.Title: SMALL CATIONIC ANTIMICROBIAL peptides
